document.docAuthor: Hernández-Orts, Jesús S., Kuchta, Roman, Semenas, Liliana, Crespo, Enrique A., González, Raúl A. & Aznar, Francisco J.
document.docTitle: Pomphorhynchus patagonicus Ortubay, Ubeda, Semenas and Kennedy 1991
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated list of the Acanthocephala from Argentina

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated list of the Acanthocephala from Argentina

subSubSection.paragraph:
Aplochiton taeniatus Jenyns
( Osmeriformes , Galaxiidae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Chubut Province : Cholila Lake ( 42º27’S , 71º40’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1994)
.

Aplochiton zebra Jenyns
( Osmeriformes , Galaxiidae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Chubut Province : Cholila Lake ( 42º27’S , 71º40’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1994)
,
Fernandez et al. (2012)
.

Cyprinus carpio Linnaeus
( Cypriniformes , Cyprinidae ). SI: liver, intestine. SD: juvenile, adult. L: Neuquén Province : Ingeniero Ballester Dam ( 38º43’32’’S , 68º10’22’’W ), Neuquén River. R:
Waicheim et al. (2014)
,
Rauque et al. (2018)
. C: voucher (MACN-Pa 564/1).

Galaxias maculatus (Jenyns)
( Osmeriformes , Galaxiidae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Neuquén Province : Lácar Lake ( 40º10’S– 71º30’S ), Machónico Lake ( 40º20’S– 71º33’S ), Filo Hua Hum Lake ( 40º30’S– 71º17’S ). R:
Viozzi et al. (2009)
,
Fernandez et al. (2015a)
. C: vouchers (MACN-Pa 462).

Galaxias platei Steindachner
( Osmeriformes , Galaxiidae ). SI: gastrointestinal tract, intestine. SD: adult. L: Chubut Province : Rosario Lake ( 43º15’S , 71º20’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1989
, 1991 , 1994),
Semenas et al. (1992)
,
Ubeda et al. (1994)
(see note below).

Odontesthes hatcheri (Eigenmann)
( Atheriniformes , Atherinopsidae ) (type host). SI: gastrointestinal tract, intestine. SD: adult. L: Río Negro Province: Alicurá Reservoir ( 40º40’S , 71º00’W ); Chubut Province: de los Cisnes Lagoon ( 42º25’S , 71º19’W ), Lezama Lake ( 42º27’S , 71º29’W ), Rosario Lake ( 43º15’S , 71º20’W ), Musters Lake (45º275’S, 69º11’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1989
, 1991 , 1994),
Semenas et al. (1992)
,
Trejo ( 1992
, 1994),
Ubeda et al. (1994)
,
Flores et al. (2016)
. C: holotype (MACN-Pa 358), allotype (MACN-Pa 358) and paratypes (MACN-Pa 358; UNCo-Pa accession numbers not provided by
Ortubay et al. (1991)
.

Olivaichthys viedmensis (MacDonagh)
( Siluriformes , Diplomystidae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Río Negro Province : Alicurá Reservoir ( 40º40’S , 71º00’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1994)
.

Oncorhynchus mykiss (Walbaum)
( Salmoniformes , Salmonidae ). SI: intestine, oesophagus, stomach. SD: juvenile, adult. L: Neuquén Province : Aluminé Lake ( 38º55’S , 71º10’W ), Filo Hua Hum Lake ( 40º28’S , 71º15’W ); Río Negro Province : Ruca Choroi Lake ( 39º12’S , 71º17’W ), Ezquerra Lagoon ( 41º03’S , 71º33’W ), Gutiérrez Lake ( 41º05’S , 71º25’W ), Alicurá Reservoir ( 40º40’S , 71º00’W ); Chubut Province : Cholila Lake ( 42º27’S , 71º40’W ), Esquel Lagoon ( 42º51’S , 71º05’W ), Rosario Lake ( 43º15’S , 71º20’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1991
, 1994),
Semenas et al. (1992)
, Trejo (1992 , 1994),
Ubeda et al. (1994)
,
Tanzola et al. (2009)
,
Rauque et al. (2018)
(see note below).

Percichthys trucha (Valenciennes)
( Perciformes , Percichthyidae ). SI: pericardium, digestive tract, intestine. SD: adult. L: Neuquén Province : Aluminé Lake ( 38º55’S , 71º10’W ); Río Negro Province : Alicurá Reservoir ( 40º40’S , 71º00’W ), Ezquerra Lagoon ( 41º03’S , 71º33’W ), Escondido Lake, Limay River , Negro River ; Chubut Province : Cholila Lake ( 42º27’S , 71º4W ), Futalaufquen Lake ( 42º50’S , 71º40’W ), Esquel Lagoon ( 42º51’S , 71º05’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1991
, 1994),
Trejo ( 1994)
, Semenas (1999) . C: UNCo-Pa, accession numbers not provided by Semenas (1999) (see note below).

Salmo trutta Linnaeus
( Salmoniformes , Salmonidae ). SI: unknown. SD: juvenile, adult. L: Patagonia. R:
Rauque et al. (2018)
.

Salvelinus fontinalis (Mitchill)
( Salmoniformes , Salmonidae ). SI: intestine. SD: juvenile, adult. L: Neuquén Province : Aluminé Lake ( 38º55’S , 71º10’W ); Chubut Province : Cholila Lake ( 42º27’S , 71º40’W ). R:
Ortubay et al. (1991
, 1994),
Rauque et al . (2018)
.

Note.
Ortubay et al. (1989)
identified this species as
Pomphorhynchus
sp. from
Galaxias platei
and
Oncorhynchus mykiss
.
Ortubay et al . (1994)
reported adult worms of
Pomphorhynchus patagonicus
in the intestine of
Percichthys colhuapiensis
from Aluminé Lake and from
Percichthys
sp. from Limay River. Largemouth perchs
Percichthys colhuapiensis
and
Percichthys
sp. from freshwater environment in Patagonia are considered morphotypes of
Percichthys trucha
(see
Ruzzante et al . 2011
). Semenas (1999) reported adult worms in the pericardium of
Percichthys trucha
, which is an atypical site of infection.

Hyalella patagonica (Cunningham)
( Amphipoda , Hyalellidae ). SI: hemocoel. SD: late acanthella, cystacanth. L: Chubut Province : Rosario Lake. R:
Ortubay et al. (1989
, 1991 ),
Semenas et al. (1992)
,
Ubeda et al. (1994)
, Rauque and de los Ríos Escalante (2013) (see note below).

Hyalella
sp. ( Amphipoda , Hyalellidae ). SI: hemocoel. SD: cystacanth. L: Neuquén Province : Montecinos Lagoon ( 39º01’S , 70º02’W ), Machónico Lake ( 40º20’S , 71º33’W ); Río Negro Province : Los Juncos Lagoon ( 41º03’S , 70º00’W ), Fantasma Lagoon ( 41º17’S , 71º34’W ); Chubut Province : Rosario Lake ( 43º15’S , 71º17’W ). R: Rauque (2013).

Note.
Ortubay et al. (1989)
identified the acanthella and cystacanths as
Pomphorhynchus
sp. from
Hyalella patagonica .
Semenas et al. (1992)
experimentally infected
Hyalella patagonica
with eggs (containing fully formed acanthors) from the pseudocoel of live gravid females of
Pomphorhynchus patagonicus
. Gravid females of
Pomphorhynchus patagonicus
were collected from the intestine of
Odontesthes hatcheri
from Rosario Lake, Chubut Province by
Semenas et al. (1992)
.
